cause.description:
all knows that at the last two years a lot of things happened in Egypt that made our life more harder like change in roles and the President Elactions and all what happens after that time the elactions of (magles elsha3b) and the Judge case we want to do things that can change that status we can start with talking and Demonstrating anything but to change what we reached to.
1. Have our simple rights of life
2. Fare President Elactions
3. NEW CONSTITUTION (new destor)
cause.mission: To have a real democracy not HOSNY MOUBARK democracy
cause.name: TO HAVE OUR RIGHTS
